Text: Re EMCA Citizens Patrol Which tuesdayIs the meeting March or March From Martha Brousseau ReplyTo To Subject Re EMCA Citizens Patrol Date Mon Mar Jaimie You can add Pat and I to the list Martha Brousseau and Pat Krieger Thanks Martha Jaimie Evans wrote Hey everyone Thanks for the positive response to the call to action for the EMCA Citizens Patrol To date my list of volunteers stands thus Joe White Joe Vodvarka Robert McLaughlin Oakie Domenech Julie Young Hilary Smith Mike Yates Michel Cahier Bess and Evan Kirchen Chris Collins Gayle Rodgers Jennifer Stelly Frank and Lorraine Zistler Jennifer Welch Robert Welch Bruce and Cheryl Hastings Perry Jackson Richard Hudson Jaimie Evans well duh Connie Evans he has no choice This puts us at about which is enough to make this a success but obviously the greater number of volunteers the less burden on everyone We are trying to work smarter not harder and do something good while investing a minimum of time So all you crime busters tomorrow night is the night of the big meeting Tuesday March pm at Welch Everyone is welcome to attend and make up their minds about their level of participation I heard a rumor that Bob Welch has offered to head this project If so I will let him arrange to get with those people who cant manage Tuesday nights meeting the names I discretely printed in bold type In any case this part of the process has to be completed in a timely fashion so we can relay the info to HPD receive their training and get this ball rolling I am looking forward to seeing all of you tomorrow night This is a really big deal and pretty exciting Cheers Jaimie Evans Yahoo Groups Sponsor ADVERTISEMENT To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of
